import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react" import axios from "axios" import {Link} from "@reach/router" const Detail = (props) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://localhost:8000/product-detail/" + id) .then((res) => setProduct(res.data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) }, []) return (
Go Home

Product Information

{product.name}

Category{product.atype}

Description{product.desc}

Price{product.price}

Rating{product.rating}

) } export default Detail
